content: I apologize, as an AI language model, I am not capable of providing information on the latest news and events. However, some examples of Newsday's past acquisition and partnership activities include its acquisition of the Long Island Press, a weekly newspaper, in 2017, and its partnership with Tribune Publishing in 2018 to expand digital offerings and subscription services. These moves could represent a strategy for expanding Newsday's reach, particularly in Long Island and the surrounding areas, while also increasing its digital capabilities and revenue streams. By working with partners or acquiring complementary businesses, Newsday may be able to stay ahead of the competition and adapt to new trends in the media industry.
